Package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.pidwrappers

Class PIDAnalogInput

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogInput
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.pidwrappers.PIDAnalogInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable, PIDSource, AutoCloseable
public class PIDAnalogInput
extends AnalogInput
implements PIDSource
Wrapper so that PIDSource is implemented for AnalogInput for old PIDController.
